[Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN)](http://scalingupnutrition.org) is a global movement of 60 countries aiming to end malnutrition in all its forms. The SUN Movement Annual Progress Report provides a detailed snapshot of the progress and results towards scaling up nutrition in SUN Countries and the broad evolution of the Movement. This package contains text dataset of the Movement's annual reports from 2011-2017 and various functions for processing, manipulating and analysing this dataset.

## Installation

The package `scalingupnutrition` can be installed in R through GitHub via `remotes`:

```{r, echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
if(!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("katilingban/scalingupnutrition")
```
